vote.title: Authorize the second of two, one-year renewal options, to the eighteen-month agreement with Durable Specialties, Inc. for the reconstruction of traffic signals, for the period of June 13, 2021, through June 12, 2022; to increase the overall contract amount - Not to exceed $1,307,500.00, from $5,230,000.00 to $6,537,500.00 - Financing: Street and Transportation (A) Fund (2017 General Obligation Bond Funds)
vote.description: Authorize the second of two, one-year renewal options, to the eighteen-month agreement with Durable Specialties, Inc. for the reconstruction of traffic signals, for the period of June 13, 2021, through June 12, 2022; to increase the overall contract amount - Not to exceed $1,307,500.00, from $5,230,000.00 to $6,537,500.00 - Financing: Street and Transportation (A) Fund (2017 General Obligation Bond Funds)
